shortdesc.ph: 输入的外部音视频流的配置。

section.note: Agora will soon stop the service for injecting online media streams on the client. If you have not implemented this service, Agora recommends that you do not use it. For details, see Service Sunset Plans.

plentry.pd: The external video stream imported successfully. The default value is 0 (same width as the original stream).
The external video stream imported successfully. The default value is 0 (same height as the original stream).
The video GOP in frames. The default value is 30 frames. The value range is [1,10000]. The default value is 30 fps.
The frame rate of the low-quality video stream frame in fps. The default rate is 15 fps.

pd.p: 外部视频流输入的码率。 The default value is 400 Kbps.
pd.note: The setting of the video bitrate is closely linked to the resolution. If the video bitrate you set is beyond a reasonable range, the SDK sets it within a reasonable range.

pd.p: 外部音频流输入的采样率。 The default value is 48000 Hz. See .
pd.note: Agora recommends setting the default value.

pd.p: 外部音频流输入的码率。 The default value is 48 Kbps.
pd.note: Agora recommends setting the default value.

pd.p:
外部音频流输入的频道数。
1: Mono (default)
2: Stereo.
pd.note: Agora recommends setting the default value.
